title: CryptoScan.one
author: CryptoScan.one
content: CryptoScan.one - service for accepting payments in USDT TRC-20 on your website.All transfers go directly to YOUR wallet.How does it work?1. You specify your wallet number and connect your project to our service.2. Your buyer goes to the payment form and transfers money to YOUR wallet.3. Our service automatically tracks the payment and notifies about its success.Is it that simple?We don't need access to your wallet.All funds are under your control.You do not need to wait for withdrawal of money, as on other payment services.The commission is 1% only for successful payments.How to pay the commission?The commission is deducted from the balance of our service automatically after each successful transaction.Website: https://cryptoscan.one/Telegram: https://t.me/cryptoscanoneIf you have a large project - write us, we will agree on the commission.

No authorisation data or secret words need to be transmitted. - Is the discount made on every transaction, or is the discount made when the user withdraws? - How much will the refund process take? Or is it not possible?Frankly, there are not many payment services that accept stablecoins, so adding other stablecoin pairs and trying to gain trust may be beneficial.
